skillTree.localised_description: The finest horses in the Old World, bred for their endurance and fiery temperament, barded for further protection.

effects.description: Mount: Barded Warhorse

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
Witnessing friendly units with the Peasant Attribute rout will not affect this unit's leadership.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

skillTree.localised_description: Stronger and faster than the mightiest warhorse, these intelligent beasts are exceptionally loyal to their noble masters.

effects.description: Mount: Royal Pegasus

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

skillTree.localised_description: Alberic's personal Hippogryph, broken years prior when the duke was a young Knight Errant, is an especially fearsome specimen of an infamously savage species.

effects.description: Mount: Hippogryph

skillTree.localised_description: A Knightly formation, in the Lady's name, to smash through battle lines; to defeat evil in the field.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +25%

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

backgroundSkills.localised_description:
"When the clarion call is sounded
	 I will ride out and fight in the name of Liege and Lady
	Whilst I draw breath the lands bequeathed
	 unto me will remain untainted by evil
	 Honour is all, Chivalry is all..."

"I set down my lance, symbol of duty
	I spurn those whom I love
	I relinquish all and take up the tools of my quest
	No obstacle will stand before me
	No plea for help shall find me waiting
	No moon will look upon me twice lest I be judged idle
	I give my body, heart and soul to the Lady whom I seek..."

"That which is sacrosanct I shall preserve
	 That which is sublime I will protect
	That which threatens I will destroy
	For my holy wrath will know no bounds..."
